overview:
As COO, Dave Benoit is leading operations to help establish Middlebury Interactive Languages as a premier academic language learning provider. The Middlebury Interactive Languagesâ€™ mission is to redefine the way world language is taught in U.S. schools, with the intent of dramatically increasing the audience, reducing the age of the learners, and improving fluency levels in shorter timeframes.

Benoit has a long track record in the education market. He established himself as a top sales and marketing performer at two of the largest education technology companies in the K-12 market, Jostens Learning and Lightspan. He then moved on to serve as an entrepreneur in residence for Sylvan Ventures. Recently, Benoit served as president and CEO of CDI America (CDIA).
